/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in a palette of red, white, and black, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes bring a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
